Where was Theodore Roosevelt born?	28 East 20th Street in the modern-day Gramercy section of New York City

What did Roosevelt do to improve his physical condition?	Roosevelt took up exercise
What did Roosevelt do to improve his physical condition?	He started boxing
Why did Roosevelt start Boxing lessons?	To deal with bullies

What was the nickname of Theodore Roosevelt's sister Anna?	Bamie as a child and Bye as an adult
What was the nickname of Theodore Roosevelt's sister Anna?	Bamie
What was Roosevelt's justification for supporting desegregation of schools in New York?	Noting that his children had been educated with other races and there was nothing wrong with it

How did newspapers respond to Roosevelt inviting Brooker T. Washington to dinner at the White House?	"mixing of the races on social occassions"
